Opinion
Pee Curiam,
Judgment affirmed on tbe opinion of President Judge Richard G. Snyder reported in 12 Pa. D. & C. 2d 54.

casebody.head_matter:
Harnish, Appellant, v. Shannon.
Argued March 19, 1958.
Before Jones, C. J., Bell, Chidsey, Musmanno, Jones and Cohen, JJ.
